psalm_docker.localPath.description: Root project directory outside docker. Default: first worspace folder. Required.

psalm_docker.remotePath.description: Root project directory accessible inside docker. Default: /var/www/html/. Required.

psalm_docker.remotePsalmXmlPath.description: Path to psalm.xml file accessible inside docker. Default: /var/www/html/psalm.xml. Required.

psalm_docker.localDockerComposePaths.description: Paths to docker-compose.override.yml/docker-compose.yml acessible outside of the docker. Required.

psalm_docker.remotePsalmServerPath.description: Path to psalm-language-server accessible inside docker. Default: /var/www/html/vendor/bin/psalm-language-server. Requried.

psalm_docker.dockerServiceName.description: Docker service name where psalm-language-server and soruce code is located. Requried.

psalm_docker.debug.description: Show debug messages in the developer tools console.
